attributes.action: Dissolve an undemocratic Parliament that does not represent the British people
attributes.additional_details:
Whether Leave or Remain the UK Parliament has failed to represent the British people and would rather play party politics with the future of the UK than put their own self interest aside and get on with the job they were elected to do.
Any currently sitting MP should be barred from re-election and a completely new parliament should be formed from people with no ties to political parties, big business or elite schools. Any new MP MUST have worked in a physical job (inc teaching, NHS, trades etc), been unemployed at some point, used the NHS and/or served in the armed forces.
attributes.background: The current members of the UK parliament have failed in their statutory duty to represent the views of the British people.
